headline: Multi-Tenant Data Center Market to Reach USD 112.38 Billion by 2032 Owing to AI, Cloud, and Edge Computing Proliferation | Research by SNS Insider
summary: The surge in cloud-based enterprise applications, edge computing, and AI workloads is accelerating investments in multi-tenant data centers globally.Austin, Aug. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The SNS Insider report indicates the Multi-Tenant Data Center Market was valued at USD 39.86 billion in 2023 and is projected to reach USD 112.38 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 12.32% during the forecast period of 2025–2032. headline: Equinix’s Outlook Lifted Amid Mixed Analyst Reactions to Strong Q2
summary: Equinix, Inc. (NASDAQ:EQIX) is one of the 12 Best REIT Stocks to Buy Right Now.
